abstract: The alternative investment firm reported on Friday $697 million in profit for the quarter, as improvements in its private equity holdings offset weaker performance in other operations.
snippet: The alternative investment firm reported on Friday $697 million in profit for the quarter, as improvements in its private equity holdings offset weaker performance in other operations.
lead_paragraph: The markets have been kind to private equity firms, and Apollo Global Management is no exception.

headline.main: Apollo’s Profit Nearly Doubled in 4th Quarter on Investment Gains

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
